CLAUSE 6 SPECIAL SERVICES 

6.1.1 In the event in which the Pipeline falls short in the effective Capacity of Transportation for the Shipment of Hydrocarbons of any of the

3.3 the obligation of the monthly payment borne by the SENDER for the Service shall be made during the totality of the term of execution of the 
Contract. 

4.1 The initial estimated amount of the Contract hereof is as indicated in the Specific Conditions. The final amount of the Contract shall correspond 
to the total of the actual invoicing by ECOPETROL and shall be established upon termination and final liquidation of the same.
